name: Export QuestionPro survey responses to Google Sheets
description: This template helps you export your QuestionPro survey data. At the specified time interval (every hour, day, week, etc), Make will automatically export the survey responses to Google Sheets. The template uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1np3fc-EC9ZBtDm6funY5LA6lcArIqFL2bS92IYfW4sw/edit?usp=sharing).
